label: 宝蔵天女, 宝蔵天
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
見出し読み: ほうぞうてんにょ, ほうぞうてん
説明文: Female deity commonly seen in Shingon as identical with Kichijōten and Benzaiten. She was approached in the esoteric rite 宝蔵天女陀羅尼法 Hōzō tennyo darani hō for purposes of acquiring fortune or victory in battle.
